text: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلْقَآءَ مَدْيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّىٓ أَن يَهْدِيَنِى سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

translation.en.sahih: And when he directed himself toward Madyan, he said, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to the sound way."
translation.id.indonesian: Dan tatkala ia menghadap kejurusan negeri Mad-yan ia berdoa (lagi): "Mudah-mudahan Tuhanku memimpinku ke jalan yang benar".
